# Vulpkanin
Vulpkanin are fox-human hybrids, sporting distinct ears and tails.
## Diet
Vulpkanin share evolutionary roots with foxes, and so they cannot metabolize Theobromine or Allicin. Be careful when eating chocolate, onions, or garlic, and avoid coffee and tea!
## Claws
Vulpkanin have dull claws, which do a mixture of [color=#ec3a3a]Blunt[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] damage.
## Fur
Vulpkanin fur provides some slight protection against the hotter and colder temperatures one can experience, but it isn't enough to protect against the vacuum of space.
